message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.SD, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security): The paper focuses on mobile app security and proposes a methodology to prevent vulnerabilities in apps. 
- cs.SE (Software Engineering): The paper proposes a design-based methodology for mobile app development and discusses the use of storyboards as a design artifact. 
- cs.PL (Programming Languages): The paper discusses the implementation of the SeMA methodology using Android Studio tooling, which involves programming in Java and XML. 
- cs.SD (Software Development): The paper proposes a methodology for developing secure mobile apps and discusses the challenges and downsides of the current approach to mobile app security. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper discusses the use of SeMA to reason about the security of an app and prevent vulnerabilities, which can be seen as a control problem.
